LongFieldProduct.title: This is a very long title that exceeds normal limits and should test the system's ability to handle lengthy input values without breaking or truncating important information in unexpected ways.
LongFieldProduct.content: This is an extremely lengthy content section designed to push the boundaries of what the API can accept. It includes multiple sentences, various punctuation marks, and enough characters to test any potential limits in the database or application layer. The content should be stored and retrieved exactly as provided, without any corruption or unintended modification.
LongFieldProduct.description: This description field is intentionally verbose to evaluate how the system handles large text inputs. It serves as a stress test for the database columns and API payload processing. Proper handling of such extended content is crucial for real-world applications where users might input detailed product information or lengthy descriptions without arbitrary length restrictions.
